title: Animals and the After Life - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/30/22
itunes:title: Animals and the After Life - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/30/22
description:
George Noory and former police officer Brandon Wainwright explore his paranormal experiences following the death of his pet dog, and how he worked with animal communicators to contact the dog's spirit and came to believe in life after death.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
